title: Cosmos.Ep7.The Backbone of Night.divx
description:
Episode 7: The Backbone of Night

Humans once thought the stars were campfires in the sky and the Milky
Way 'The Backbone of Night'. In this fascinating segment, Cosmos host 
Dr. Carl Sagan takes viewers back to ancient Greece when the right 
answser to such basic questions as 'What are the stars?' was first
glimpsed. He visits the Brooklyn elementary school of his childhood
where this same question is still being asked.

Digitally Remastered
Audio: 6 Channel Stereo (English)
Video: 4:3  640x480 (Divx)
